attributes.additional_details: BRING BACK NATIONAL SERVICE TO PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT WHERE YOUTHS OF TODAY ARE TAUGHT STRUCTURE, RESPECT AND RESPONSIBILITY FOR THEIR ACTIONS AND THE CONSEQUENCES OF NOT CONFORMING.  THIS WOULD PROVIDE DISCIPLINE WHICH A LOT OF YOUNG PEOPLE TODAY DO NOT HAVE AND ULTIMATELY CREATE BETTER INDIVIDUALS.  A SMALL REMUNERATION WOULD CUT DOWN BENEFITS PAYMENTS AS THEY WOULD BE PROVIDED WITH FOOD AND SHELTER AS WELL AS BASIC TRAINING AND POSSIBLE SKILLS TO HELP IN THE FUTURE
